job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: ltstronggtltemgtHelp shape the next generation of ecommerce for the next generation of consumerltbrgtltbrgtltemgtltstronggtltstronggtTechnology  StockXltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtOur Technology Team is on a mission to build the next generation ecommerce platform for the next generation customer We build worldclass innovative experiences and products that give our users access to the worlds mostcoveted products and unlock economic opportunity by turning reselling into a business for anyone Our team uses cutting edge technologies that handle massive scale globally Were an internetnative cloudnative company from day 1  you wont find legacy technology here If youre a curious leader who loves solving problems wearing multiple hats and learning new things join usltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtWhat Youll DoltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtDesign build and evolve microservices used by StockX web and mobile applicationsltligtltligtCollaborate with frontend and backend engineers to build scalable servicesltligtltligtWrite quality code and world class documentation which can be used as the example for the company ltligtltligtDebug and monitor production systemsltligtltligtWork effectively in an agile development processltligtltligtConstantly evolve the platform to identify bottlenecks in both runtime and development time aspects of the platform and improve themltligtltligtWork with Product UX and Design to build a worldclass microservices and workflow engineltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtAbout YoultbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtMinimum of 2 years of relevant experienceltligtltligtExpert in Java programming language or similar ObjectOriented languageltligtltligtExceptional skill in solving complex problems by use of right data structure and algorithms Indepth understanding of various Data Structure and Algorithms are expected ltligtltligtExperience in working with various data storage eco systems  Relational databases NoSQL databases and Caching systems ltligtltligtSome exposure in using design patterns to solve design problemsltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtAbout UsltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtOur global platform offers unprecedented access to current culture while our datadriven bidask model provides buyers with the realtime visibility to know theyre getting a fair price And unlike other ecommerce sites StockX handchecks every purchase 20000 daily trades at one of our regional authentication centersltbrgtltbrgtStockXs special formula has rocketed the company to a multibillion dollar valuation with 10M lifetime trades on the platformltemgtltemgtmore than half of those coming in the last year And were just getting startedltbrgtltbrgtltemgtWe are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company We do not discriminate on the basis of race religion color national origin gender sexual orientation age marital status veteran status or disability status This job description is intended
